Flexible Terms:
No contracts. No setup fees. Monthly billing, cancel at anytime. 7 Day money back guarantee.

Is any support included with my Xen VPS?
Yes, hardware and network support is included. All Xen vps are 100% self managed by the client.

Is your setup really instant?
All VPS orders are setup by SolusVM instantly upon payment receipt. With VPS Unlimited you do not need to wait for human intervention to start using the services you paid for!
*Please allow up to 15 minutes from confirmed payment for your VPS to come online.

Do you offer internal IPs?
Yes, if you purchase two or more VPSs from us, we can configure internal IP addresses for you so that your VPSs can communicate with each other without wasting your bandwidth.

Can I cancel at any time?
You are allowed to cancel at anytime. We just ask that you cancel three days before your billing date.

Do you offer a money back guarantee?
VPS Unlimited offers you a risk free money back guarantee. At any time in the first 7 days after ordering your first VPS from us, simply log into your client area and submit a support ticket asking for a refund and you should receive it within 48 hours. Excludes custom orders, additional IPs and control panels.
